## decode2HalfFromRGBA() function

Decodes two half floats that was encoded into a rgba8unorm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function decode2HalfFromRGBA(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, value: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  value | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The rgba8unorm to be decoded |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

A vec2 that contains the two half floats
